price: 75.Munaafiqhiin tumaleelak Yalli isi muxxok maalu neh yeceek diggah nanu sadaqhat kaak aceennooh meqe mari edde abam kaat abennooh meqe marak, marak teyna akkenno iyyaanamah Yallah xagana cule mari keenit yan.
arabic: ۞ وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ عَٰهَدَ ٱللَّهَ لَئِنۡ ءَاتَىٰنَا مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ لَنَصَّدَّقَنَّ وَلَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man ʿāhada al-laha la-in ātānā min faḍlihi lanaṣṣaddaqanna walanakūnanna mina al-ṣāliḥīna
